INTERNAL_OPEN_ID_URL: The OpenId configuration endpoint for internal token. When testing locally, use for example https://localhost:6001/.well-known/openid-configuration
EXTERNAL_OPEN_ID_URL: The OpenId configuration endpoint for external Azure token, formatted as https://<tentant-id>.b2clogin.com/<tentant-id>.onmicrosoft.com/<sign-in-user-flow>/v2.0/.well-known/openid-configuration
BACKEND_BFF_APP_ID: The client id of the 'backend-bff-app' application registration.
AZURE_B2C_BACKEND_ID: The client id of the 'backend-b2b-app' application registration.
AZURE_B2C_BACKEND_OBJECT_ID: The object id of the 'backend-b2b-app' application registration.
AZURE_B2C_BACKEND_SPN_OBJECT_ID: The object id of the 'backend-b2b-app' service principal (the enterprise application for the application registration).
AZURE_B2C_SPN_ID: The client id of the 'sp-b2c-<environment>' service principal with management permissions.
AZURE_B2C_SPN_SECRET: The client secret of the 'sp-b2c-<environment>' service principal with management permissions.
AZURE_B2C_TENANT: The tenant id of the current tenant, e.g. devDataHubB2C.onmicrosoft.com
TOKEN_KEY_NAME: The name of the key used to sign the token.
TOKEN_KEY_VAULT: The address of the key vault containing the token signing key.
CERTIFICATES_KEY_VAULT: The address of the key vault containing the actor certificates
